item.description:
Updated location...please see below.

The weather looks nice for this weekend so I'm setting up a couple of Meetups for you all to get out and play. I am not available to host either Meetup this weekend so if someone could please volunteer to look after things, that would be great. Just send me a note if you're around to be an "interim-host" :)

Neither the Men's team or the Women's team have meets this weekend at Tufts, but they may be practicing at some point on Saturday so it's a bit of a crap-shoot but you should be able to get some good hitting time in before having to leave the courts.

Happy Hitting and I hope to be around next weekend.

Adam Kenger
Organizer
Somerville Tennis Meetup Group

4/23 Update: According to the reply in this post on our Meetup message board, the main Tufts courts will not be available on Saturday. (Thanks for the heads-up Tommy and Huong!)

We could play instead at Dugger Park (five courts), which is less than two miles from the Tufts courts. For directions, you can create a Google Map from your house (or from the Tufts courts; see address above) to Dugger Park, Medford, MA 02155.

I will be at the Dugger Park courts at 8:30am for anyone who wants to give at a try. (At that time I don't think we'll have much competition for the courts.)

Dave
Interim-Host-Type Guy
Somerville Tennis Meetup Group
item.how_to_find_us: Just ask, are you with meetup?
item.name: Saturday Morning Tennis at Dugger Park
